overview:
Bharanidharan is the Founder and CEO of Antya Web Private Limited, which owns antya.com, a website discovery engine. He is also associated with ITIAN INFO LABS Private Limited, which owns 91mobiles.com, a comprehensive mobile phone portal for Indians. He started his entrepreneurial journey in late 2007.

He also was part of the founding team of Accentium Web Private Limited, company running suite of consumer internet portals targeted towards India. During his tenure, Accentium launched secondshaadi.com, gaadi.com, studynation.com and taaza.com. He was in-charge for the Product and Technology.

Bharanidharan has rich and wide experience in the online industry. He started his career in the Internet Industry when he was part of the iBiBo.com founding team.

He is a management graduate from ISB and a mechanical Engineer from Anna University. Prior to ISB, he has served in the technology industry for almost 6 years.
